triples.name: Emotion recognition in conversation
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the specific task of recognizing emotions in conversational contexts.

triples.name: Multimodal learning
triples.relevance: The paper integrates multiple data modalities (text, audio, visual) to improve emotion recognition.

triples.name: Graph neural network
triples.relevance: Graph neural networks form the basis of the paper's dynamic fusion module for capturing conversational context.

triples.name: Attention (machine learning)
triples.relevance: Attention mechanisms are employed to fuse multimodal information by focusing on relevant contextual features.

triples.name: Data fusion
triples.relevance: The core operation of combining information from multiple modalities to reduce redundancy and enhance complementarity.

triples.name: Neural network (machine learning)
triples.relevance: The paper proposes MM-DFN, a novel multimodal dynamic fusion network architecture for emotion recognition that advances the state-of-the-art in conversational emotion understanding.
